body_html: Tangle Teezer’s innovative, extra gentle detangler featuring SKIMS signature aesthetic. Includes a unique wide-spaced teeth pattern that is designed to minimize breakage and hair fall. Part of the limited edition Tanger Teezer x SKIMS Collection.

title: SLIP X SKIMS PURE SILK CONTOUR SLEEP MASK | CHERRY BLOSSOM CANDY HEART PRINT
body_html: Protect your eyelashes while you sleep with this Slip® x SKIMS contour sleep mask. Features a shaped, contoured design that sits away from your eyelids while you sleep. Made in SKIMS iconic colorways with delicate eyelash extensions in mind. Part of the limited edition Slip® x SKIMS Collection. While slip® has made all efforts to design its contour sleep mask to be suitable for eyelash extensions, slip® acknowledges that not all lashes are the same and the contour sleep mask may not be suitable for all lengths or types of lashes. Slip® encourages you to use your own discretion in deciding whether the contour sleep mask is suitable for you.

title: THE NORTH FACE X SKIMS REFINA LONG SLEEVE TOP | PHOENIX
body_html: Your ski pass to the perfect base layer. title: THE NORTH FACE X SKIMS 1995 DENALI FLEECE JACKET | PHOENIX
body_html: The North Face's original Denali fleece is updated with SKIMS signature aesthetic in this winter staple. Made with an oversized relaxed fit, this unisex fleece brings endless comfort and style to casual outings and cold weather adventures. Woven overlays on the collar, chest, back yoke, and lower sleeves add an extra layer of durability. Designed in SKIMS classic colorways as part of the limited-edition The North Face x SKIMS Collection. For women: choose your regular size for an oversized look, For men: fits true to size Shell A: 200D, 360 g/m2, 100% Recycled Polyester. Shell B/Overlay: 160D, 118 g/m2, 100% Recycled Nylon with non-PFC durable water-repellent (non-PFC DWR) finish. Pocket Bags: 72D, 150 g/m2, 100% Recycled Polyester.
